component.name: DELETE_healthcare_{municipality}_immunization_records_{recordId}
component.description: Deletes an immunization record by its ID for a specific municipality

component.name: GET_health
component.description: Returns the health status of the API

component.name: GET_healthcare_{municipality}_immunization_records
component.description: Retrieves all immunization records for children in a specific municipality

component.name: GET_healthcare_{municipality}_immunization_records_{recordId}
component.description: Retrieves a specific immunization record by its unique identifier within a municipality

component.name: POST_healthcare_{municipality}_immunization_register
component.description: Registers a newborn child into the national immunization registry for a specific municipality
